definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: subdue, bring into bondage (NH id., press, oppress; Aram. [[כְּבַשׁ]], kba4 tread down, beat or make a path, subdue; Ar. kabasa press, squeeze, knead (body or limb, as in the bath, message), also attack, assault)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[וְכָֽבְשׁוּ]] consec. Zec 9:15; Impf. [[יִכְבּוֹשׁ]] Mic 7:19; [[וַיִּכְבְּשׁוּם]] Je 34:11 Qr (Kt Hiph), etc.; Imv. pl. sf. [[כִּבְשֻׁהָ]] Ge 1:28; Inf. [[כְּבוֹשׁ]] 2Ch 28:10, Es 7:8; Pt. [[כּׂבְשִׁים]] Ne 5:5; —
bring into bondage, sq. acc. + [[לַעֲבָדִים]] Je 34:11, Je 34:16, 2Ch 28:10, Ne 5:5.
(late) subdue, force, a woman Es 7:8 (= earlier [[עִנׇּה]]).
subdue, dominate, the earth Ge 1:28 (P), Zec 9:15 (of conquest); tread down, sq. [[אַבְנֵי־קֶלַע]]; fig. subdue, sq. [[עֲוֹנׁתֵינוּ]] Mic 7:19.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[נִכְבְּשָׁה]] Jos 18:1 + 3 t.; Pt. fpl. [[נִכְבָּשׁוֹת]] Ne 5:5; —pass. of

definitions.title: Qal 3,
definitions.body: subj. [[הָאָרֶץ]] (of conquest) Nu 32:22, Nu 32:29, Jos 18:1 (all P), 1Ch 22:18.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. bring into bondage, sq. acc. + [[לַעֲבָדִים]] Je 34:11 Kt (Qr
